data.name: Preset Message 1
data.message: “Only engineers have the power to do the impossible because they have the tool of science to create something new…. Happy Engineer's Day to you!”

data.name: Preset Message 2
data.message: “Engineers are the ones who bring technology to make our lives simpler, to bring comforts, to bring ease and today is the day to thank them…. Happy Engineer's Day!”

data.name: Preset Message 3
data.message: “You are the one who can create anything with your brains and creativity because you are an engineer…. Wishing you a very Happy Engineer's Day.”

data.name: Preset Message 4
data.message: “Science is about knowing; engineering is about doing.”

data.name: Preset Message 5
data.message: “The engineer has been, and is, a maker of history.”

data.name: Preset Message 6
data.message: “Engineering is the art of directing the great sources of power in nature for the use and convenience of man.”

data.name: Preset Message 7
data.message: “Science can amuse and fascinate us all, but it is engineering that changes the world.”

data.name: Preset Message 8
data.message: “Let us take a pledge to make our environment healthier and greener on World Environment Day.”

data.name: Preset Message 9
data.message: “Normal people believe that if it ain’t broke, don’t fix it. Engineers believe that if it ain’t broke, it doesn’t have enough features yet.”

data.name: Preset Message 10
data.message: “Math is my Passion. Engineering is my Profession.”
